scripts.view-coverage: echo 'Generating coverage reports...'; npm run coverage >/dev/null && echo '...done.' && xdg-open ./coverage/lcov-report/index.html >/dev/null
scripts._bootstrap: npm install --save-dev --save-exact coveralls format-json istanbul jshint nodangel tap-spec@2 tape-catch mve && npm install json && json --in-place -f package.json -e 'delete this.scripts._bootstrap' && npm run diffy-package && echo 'Ready!'
